segments.text: Watching the woman dry the plate while the sink overflows is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so oblivious to the chaos around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That water is pouring out like a waterfall, and it’s like she doesn’t care at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the unstable stool, reaching for cookies like it’s some kind of heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, yet I can’t shake off the fear that he might come crashing down at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is eagerly waiting, her hand outstretched, completely unaware of the potential dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s both adorable and completely reckless at the same time, which makes me worry.
segments.speaker: PAR
